attributes.action: All the schools should provide an option for online learning during Pandemic
attributes.additional_details: A school class should not have more than 15 pupils in the class. A playground should not have more 30 pupils at any given time. All teachers should wear a mask so they can help pupil with more confidence. Under such unforeseen circumstance's parents should not be penalized for not sending kids to school.
attributes.background: Government should provide an option for parents who would like to continue with home learning whenever there is restriction of not more than 6 to 12 people allowed in social gathering .
